title: I am not able to purchase RP through paypal??
body:
Every time I attempt to purchase RP through paypal. It always comes up with the following error:

At this time, we are unable to process your request. Please return to Riot Games, Limited and try another option.

It would be really appreciated if anyone could help me as I really want to buy some skins which are on sale haha. 

Thanks.

replies.body: Are you experiencing this issue on the Legacy or Beta Client? Also, are you signing into your PayPal account each time you try this or have you left yourself signed in from previous transactions?

I'm experiencing this issue on the Legacy Client and yes im signing into my PayPal account each time I try to buy the RP. I didnt save my paypal details from previous transactions. I have been attempting this for almost 2 days and it always comes up with the same error.

EDIT::: I just attempted to buy rp on the Beta client and the same error occured :((((

I'd recommend logging into your PayPal account in your browser so you can ensure all your account information is correct and that you've configured the correct card to be used by default. If you're still seeing issues after that, you'll want to reach out to [**PayPal Support**](https://www.paypal.com/us/selfhelp/home) for further assistance with troubleshooting this, as these errors usually come from their end.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Same thing is happening to me, and i loged in to my paypal acc and everything is in order.
Did you reach out to [**PayPal Support**](https://www.paypal.com/us/selfhelp/home) in case this was something caused by an error on their end?
i did and they said it might be that the link is broken something like that. Sry not much info there
